publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1365 Kenny MacAskill: Draft Protected Trust Deeds (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Protected Trust Deeds (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
